channel.title: japanese on In Search of Lost Time
channel.description: Recent content in japanese on In Search of Lost Time

item.title: 「ひとりぼっちの部屋」 高木麻早 (1973)
item.description: ‘Alone in my room’ is a song by Takagi Masa from the single ‘Alone in my room’

item.title: 「少しだけ片想い」 荒井由実/松任谷由実 (1975)
item.description: ‘I love you more than you’ is a song by Yumi Arai aka Yumi Matsutoya (post marriage) from her 1975 album COBALT HOUR

item.title: 「涙をふいて」 三好鉄生 (1982)
item.description: ‘Wipe the tears’ is a song by Tessei Miyoshi from his 1982 single of the same name

item.title: 「さらばシベリア鉄道」 大滝詠一 (1981)
item.description: ‘Farewall Siberian Railway’ is a song by Eiichi Ohtaki from his 1981 album A Long Vacation

item.title: 「FUN×4」 大滝詠一 (1981)
item.description: ‘FUNx4’ is a song by Eiichi Ohtaki from his 1981 album A Long Vacation

item.title: 「恋するカレン」 大滝詠一 (1981)
item.description: The title of the song translates to ‘Karen in Love / Oh Karen’ by Eiichi Ohtaki from his 1981 album A Long Vacation

item.title: 「スピーチ・バルーン」 大滝詠一 (1981)
item.description: The title of the song translates to ‘Speech Balloon’ by Eiichi Ohtaki from his 1981 album A Long Vacation

item.title: 「雨のウェンズデイ」 大滝詠一 (1981)
item.description: The title of the song translates to ‘A Rainy Wednesday’ by Eiichi Ohtaki from his 1981 album A Long Vacation

item.title: 「我が心のピンボール」 大滝詠一 (1981)
item.description: The title of the song translates to ‘My Pinball Heart’ or ‘My Heart is a Pinball’ by Eiichi Ohtaki from his 1981 album A Long Vacation

item.title: 「カナリア諸島にて」 大滝詠一 (1981)
item.description: The title of the song translates to ‘At Canary Islands’ by Eiichi Ohtaki from his 1981 album A Long Vacation

item.title: 「Velvet Motel」 大滝詠一 (1981)
item.description: ‘Velvet Motel’ is a song by Eiichi Ohtaki from his 1981 album A Long Vacation

item.title: 「時の流れに身を任せ」 テレサテン (1986)
item.description: Title of the song translates to ‘Give yourself to the flow of time’ by Teresa Teng from her 1986 album of the same name

item.title: 「結婚しようよ」 吉田拓郎 (1972)
item.description: Title of the song translates to ‘Let’s Marry’ by Takuro Yoshida from his 1972 single of the same name

item.title: 「都会」 小貫妙子 (1977)
item.description: Title of the song translates to ‘City’ by Taeko Ohnuki from her 1977 album Sunshower

item.title: 「あなたのいない夜」 荒木一郎 (1974)
item.description: Title of the song translates to ‘Evening silence of your absence’ by Ichiro Araki from his 1974 album 蹉跌 (Setback)
